item.title: Working with Placement Groups
item.description: Placement Groups Creation To create a group, we need to know a few pieces of information. With the slcli this can all be obtained with slcli vs placementgroup create-options Router (Pod in a datacenter) the group should be located behind. curl -u $SL_USER:$SL_APIKEY -X GET -H "Accept: */*" 'https://api.softlayer.com/rest/v3.1/SoftLayer_Virtual_PlacementGroup/getAvailableRouters.json' Virtual_PlacementGroup::getAvailableRouters() will print a list of all routers that support placement groups. You will need the router ID listed. Rule which the group should enforce curl -u $SL_USER:$SL_APIKEY -X GET -H "Accept: */*" 'https://api.
